(1) Stay and continue listening - The more you know about your destination the better prepared you will be
(2) Leave - These rebels seem radical and you donâ€™t want to get mixed up with them
You continue on the North Road toward Riverfoot Keep. 
After 4 days of travel you hear some whispering from the direction of the Starving Marshes. 
4 voices are talking about how cruel the Rulers of Riverfoot Keep are. 
They seem to be Rebels and you are not sure how long you can eavesdrop without being noticed.
>> What do you do?
